Package org.cougaar.lib.web.service

This package contains the Cougaar implementation of the ServletService, which provides HTTP access into Cougaar agents.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
RootServletService This service is the root-level ServletService, for use each agent's LeafServletServiceComponent to advertise the ServletService.
 

Class Summary
AgentsServlet A servlet that handles all "/agents" requests by optionally displaying locally-registered names or globally-registered names (in the nameserver).
BlockRobotsServlet This servlet handles "/robots.txt" requests with a hard-coded disallow response: User-agent: * Disallow: / to keep out web-crawlers, such as Google.
FavIconServlet This servlet handles "/favicon.ico" requests with our local "favicon.ico" image file.
FileServlet A servlet that provides directory and file read access.
LeafServletServiceComponent This component advertises the agent-internal ServletService, based upon the node-level RootServletService.
ListRegistryServlet A servlet that displays all the paths in a ServletRegistry, for leaf servlet service use (within an Agent).
NamingServerRegistry An implementation of GlobalRegistry that uses the WhitePagesService.
RedirectServlet This servlet handles "/redirect" requests.
RootServletServiceComponent This component uses the ServletEngineService to advertise the root-level RootServletService, which is used by the agent-level LeafServletServiceComponents to create the agent-internal ServletService.
UnknownLeafPathServlet A "/$name[/.*]" level servlet that: generates a help message for "/$name" and "/$name/" requests, and generates an error message for all other (unknown) paths .
WelcomeServlet A servlet that generates a top-level HTML welcome page in response to the "/" path.
 

Package org.cougaar.lib.web.service Description

This package contains the Cougaar implementation of the ServletService, which provides HTTP access into Cougaar agents.

This package defines the node-level RootServletServiceComponent, which creates the org.cougaar.lib.web.arch.server.ServletEngine and advertises the RootServletService. The standard org.cougaar.lib.web.arch.server.ServletEngine implementation is based on Tomcat and is defined in the "webtomcat" module ("org.cougaar.lib.web.tomcat") to avoid compile dependencies and allow for non-Tomcat implementations. From the org.cougaar.lib.web.arch.server.ServletEngine's point of view, there is just one "gateway" servlet, the RootServlet. Agents are loaded with the LeafServletServiceComponent, which obtains the RootServletService, registers the agent's "/$name" path, and advertises the ServletService for component use.

For more detail, including configuration options and example servlets, see the Cougaar Developers' Guide.
